instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Cinzel' and 'Lato' from Google Fonts immediately in index.html or CSS.
2. PARCHMENT MODE: For the Questionnaire page, use the 'parchment_texture' as the background of the main container, not the whole body.
3. POKEBALL DECOR: Try to build the Pokeball and Masterball using the 'css_objects' classes first. It looks cleaner. Use images only if CSS fails.
4. DASHBOARD: The dashboard should feel like a 'Student Noticeboard'. Use the Bento grid layout.
5. NOTIFICATIONS: Make the 'New Questionnaire' notification the largest item (Hero Card) in the dashboard.
6. EMAIL: Ensure the email template shares the same 'Parchment' aesthetic.
7. SHADCN: Customize Shadcn components to remove the default 'radius-md' look and make them either 'radius-sm' (sharp) or 'radius-xl' (pill) depending on context. Avoid default rounded-md.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
